testcase.name: Select iPhone 16 Pro and add materials to cart
testcase.system-out:
Scenario: Select iPhone 16 Pro and add materials to cart &amp#27;[90m# src/test/resources/features/casekaro.feature:3&amp#27;[0m Browser Launched &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mUser opens Casekaro website&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.openWebsite()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mUser navigates to Phone cases by model page&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.navigateToModelPage()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mUser searches for &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"iPhone"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.searchBrand(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mOther brands should not be visible&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.validateBrandsHidden()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mUser selects &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"iPhone 16 Pro"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.selectModel(java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mUser opens the first product&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.openFirstProduct()&amp#27;[0m Selecting material : Hard Selecting material : Soft Selecting material : Glass &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mUser adds following materials to cart:&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.addMaterials(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable)&amp#27;[0m | Hard | | Soft | | Glass | Visible Cart Items : 3 &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mCart should contain &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m3&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m items&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.validateCartItems(int)&amp#27;[0m
====== CART ITEM DETAILS ======
Item 1 Material : Glass Price : Rs. 249.00 Link : https://casekaro.com/products/classic-cafe-racer-99-iphone-16-pro-back-cover?variant=42175478628470 ---------------------------------- Item 2 Material : Soft Price : Rs. 149.00 Link : https://casekaro.com/products/classic-cafe-racer-99-iphone-16-pro-back-cover?variant=42175478595702 ---------------------------------- Item 3 Material : Hard Price : Rs. 69.00 Link : https://casekaro.com/products/classic-cafe-racer-99-iphone-16-pro-back-cover?variant=42175478562934 ---------------------------------- &amp#27;[32mAnd &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mPrint cart item details&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# stepdefinitions.CasekaroSteps.printCartDetails()&amp#27;[0m Browser Closed
